overview: In this last issue of The Private Adventures of Pierre Woodman we will go through the Superfuckers series and we will discover some of Pierre's most intimate thoughts on many issues of the adult business and life in general. And don't forget to go to the end of the DVD, where you will get fresh information about Pierre and Private.
tagline: The Most Highly Awarded European Porn Director Ever, Reveals His Most Exciting Secrets And Adventures
title: Behind The Scenes
